message: Let's start with a fair split, 60/40. I'll give you a chance to accept or decline.
I'll start with a strong offer, but be warned, I'll be increasing my offer over time!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, 55/45. Don't expect it to get any better from me, though!
You're not budging, so I'll try to squeeze more out of you!
Let's meet in the middle, 50/50. It's time to stop playing hardball!
You're not willing to meet in the middle? I'll try to take advantage of that!
I'm not going down without a fight! I'll give you a slightly better deal, 40/60. Don't underestimate me!
